name: RICCOSHADE
description:
RICCOSHADE (PC Edition)

In this bouncy, addicting, colour-themed game, your aim is to HIT ALL THE TARGETS within the amount of colour-coded bullets you have, but WITH AS MANY BOUNCES as you can!

Gameplay Trailer

Visit our website here.

We from KIT would love to hear your overall thoughts, share your Let's plays and let us know what you think of this game. Hope you folks out there enjoy it!

Cheers...  : )
